Representation.Label: Peduncle
Representation.Detail: Measure the distance from the tuber to the base of the spathe.

Representation.Label: Spadix appendix
Representation.Detail: The smooth sterile portion of the spadix.

Representation.Label: Staminate flowers and anthers
Representation.Detail: Look for the anther colour in young inflorescences before anthesis (colour from living plants)

Representation.Label: Entire spathe length
Representation.Detail: Measure from the base of the spathe to the tip

Representation.Label: Spathe-limb
Representation.Detail: The upper expanded portion of the spathe above the tube

Representation.Label: Spathe-tube
Representation.Detail: The lower tubular portion of the spathe

Representation.Label: horizontal-rhizomatous tuber
Representation.Detail: growing sideways in the manner of a bearded Iris, in time forming spreading colonies.

Representation.Label: Vertical discoid tuber
Representation.Detail: Similar to a tuberous-rooted Begonia in shape. Has a central growth point, and may be orientated vertically or horizontally.

Representation.Label: Peduncle much shorter than leaves
Representation.Detail: "Cryptic species" inflorescence held at ground level, far below the leaves

Representation.Label: Peduncle shorter than leaves
Representation.Detail: "Cryptic species" inflorescence held below the leaves

Representation.Label: Peduncle equal to leaves
Representation.Detail: Inflorescence held equal to the leaves

Representation.Label: Peduncle exceeding the leaves
Representation.Detail: "Flag" species, inflorescence held above the leaves

Representation.Label: Spadix appendix clavate
Representation.Detail: Spadix appendix clavate or club-shaped

Representation.Label: Fusiform
Representation.Detail: Swollen at middle and tapering to each end like a spindle.

Representation.Label: Appendix stipe long
Representation.Detail: Sterile spadix appendix narrowing abruptly into a long stipe or stalk

Representation.Label: Appendix stipe short
Representation.Detail: Sterile spadix appendix narrowing abruptly into a short stipe or stalk

Representation.Label: Appendix stipe absent
Representation.Detail: Sterile spadix appendix stalkless or tapering gradually towards the base

Representation.Label: Spadix ¼ to ½ as long as spathe-limb
Spadix c. ½ as long as spathe-limb
Spadix more than ½ as long to sub-equal to spthe-limb
Spadix sub-equal to longer than spathe-limb
Total spadix length
Representation.Detail: Measure from the base of spadix to the tip

Representation.Label: Spathe-limb inside
Representation.Detail: The main base colour of the spathe-limb within. If unsure choose all that apply.

Representation.Label: Spathe-limb outside
Representation.Detail: The main base colour on the outside of the spathe-limb. If unsure choose all that apply.

Representation.Label: Spathe-tube inside
Representation.Detail: The colour within the spathe-tube. If unsure, choose all that apply

Representation.Label: Spathe-tube outside
Representation.Detail: The colour on the outside of the spathe-tube. If unsure choose all that apply
